States.summary: Represents a collection of State objects.

LJCDeserialize.summary: Deserializes from the specified XML file.

remarks.para: If the requested XML file does not exist, a default file will be created with the fifty U.S. states, plus American Samoa(AS), District of Columbia(DC), Federated States of Micronesia(FM), Guam(GU), Marshall Islands(MH), Northern Mariana Islands(MP), Palau(PW), Puerto Rico(PR) and Virgin Islands(VI).
A default StateLookup XML file will also be created if it does not exist.

Add.summary: Creates and adds the object from the supplied values.
